title: Dayforce_Timesheet
description: Dayforce Timesheet data structure for API integration

EmployeeXRefCode.description: External reference code identifying the employee for whom the timesheet is recorded.

OrgUnitXRefCode.description: External reference code for the organization unit or department.

PayPeriodStartDate.description: Start date of the pay period for this timesheet.

PayPeriodEndDate.description: End date of the pay period for this timesheet.

TimesheetDate.description: The date this timesheet entry applies to.

JobXRefCode.description: External reference code of the job assigned to this timesheet entry.

DepartmentXRefCode.description: External reference code for the department related to this timesheet entry.

ProjectXRefCode.description: External reference code of the project related to this entry, if applicable.

PayCategoryXRefCode.description: External reference code of the pay category for the recorded hours.

ShiftXRefCode.description: External reference code for the shift worked, if applicable.

StartTime.description: Start time of the employee’s work for the day.

EndTime.description: End time of the employee’s work for the day.

HoursWorked.description: Total number of hours worked during the shift.

BreakMinutes.description: Total break duration in minutes during the work shift.

IsOvertime.description: Indicates whether the hours worked include overtime.

IsApproved.description: Indicates whether the timesheet entry has been approved by a manager.

IsDeleted.description: Indicates whether the timesheet entry has been marked as deleted.

Comment.description: Employee or manager comment regarding this timesheet entry.

ReferenceDate.description: Optional reference date related to the timesheet entry.
